response.overview: This documentary series borrows from Guo Moruo's short story "Marx Enters the Confucian Temple", and lets Marx and Confucius, two thinkers separated by more than 2,000 years, meet in a virtual Yuelu Academy. Guests and students ask questions as well. Zhang Guozhu, director of the China Center for Cultural Soft Power Research, Zhao Dongmei, professor of Peking University, Guo Jicheng, associate professor of China University of Political Science and Law, Zhong Jun, president of Hunan Academy of Social Sciences, Chen Yuxiong, party secretary of Yuelu Academy, Zhang Mingming, dean of the School of Marxism at China University of Petroleum, and Wang Lei, research fellow of Shenyang Academy of Education, participate in the se discussions. This documentary series analyzes an important aspect of Xi Jinping Thought, "The 2nd Combination" aka combining Marxism with traditional Chinese culture.
response.title: Marx Enters the Confucian Temple
